title: fried hake on the bone with Arbequina olive oil mash, surf clams, chorizo and flat parsley
description: Meaty white fish, clams and chorizo are a classic combination in this tapa dish. Serve with a glass of chilled manzanilla sherry.
ingredients: 1 large potato, preferably Desirée variety, peeled and evenly diced
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 x trimmed and cleaned darnes of hake, about 200g/7oz each
125g/4½oz hot cooking chorizo, peeled and diced
1 small banana shallot, peeled and diced
1 sprig flat leaf parsley, leaves picked and chopped
